comments:
We're having a problem with the creating statistical agents.  Something in TPTP 4.2 must have changed that is causing the following exception.  What we're doing is importing statistical data, and the Statistical viewer works fine on the data that we import.  However, if I do a Rightclick and Save on the Monitor, then re-start the workbench.  Then try opening the monitor with the statistical graph viewer I get the following problem with UI error pop ups.
 
Please help.

Antony, please mark this as invalid. It seems to work fine with a newer Eclipse, and I've not been able to reproduce it at all. No statistical ui code has changed, so this must have been an issue in the underlying emf code.
